channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 在阿比盖尔-约翰逊（Abigail Johnson）担任首席执行官期间，富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）任命了一批新的高管担任重要的高级职务，其中包括财务总监，这是管理层最大的一次调整。
item.description: Fidelity Investments appointed a new slate of executives to key senior roles, including finance chief, in one of the biggest management reshuffles in Abigail Johnson’s run as CEO on.wsj.com/3OCE9xT on.wsj.com/3OCE9xT

item.title: 美国官员称，俄罗斯情报机构正试图通过散布虚假信息破坏美国在非洲的影响力
item.description: Russian intelligence agencies are trying to undermine U.S. influence in Africa by spreading disinformation, U.S. officials say on.wsj.com/3OAtpQw on.wsj.com/3OAtpQw

item.title: 拉斯维加斯转变为全球体育中心的过程，反映了沙特阿拉伯为提升其全球形象而掀起的体育狂潮。
item.description: The transformation of Las Vegas into a global sports hub mirrors the sports-fueled binge that Saudi Arabia has used to enhance its global profile. on.wsj.com/42ABMBw

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的律师试图将他的名字保留在科罗拉多州的选票上，最高法院将听取有关因涉嫌参与叛乱而取消总统候选人资格的争论。
item.description: The Supreme Court is set to hear arguments over disqualifying a presidential candidate for allegedly engaging in insurrection, as lawyers for Donald Trump seek to keep his name on the Colorado ballot on.wsj.com/3OwdAtV

item.title: 巴基斯坦正在进行一场考验其脆弱民主的选举，该国主要反对党的瘫痪和恐怖袭击的威胁使投票日气氛紧张
item.description: Pakistan is voting in an election that will test its fragile democracy, as the hobbling of the country’s key opposition party and the threat of terrorist attacks make for a tense day at the polls on.wsj.com/3HS6xIo on.wsj.com/3HS6xIo

item.title: 美国在伊拉克的一次空袭炸死了伊朗支持的伊拉克民兵的一名指挥官，美国称该民兵对上周在约旦基地造成三名美国人死亡的无人机袭击事件负有责任
item.description: A U.S. airstrike in Iraq killed a commander of the Iran-backed Iraqi militia that the U.S. said was responsible for a drone strike that killed three Americans at a base in Jordan last week on.wsj.com/3uq5jB4 on.wsj.com/3uq5jB4

item.title: 现在办公室里到处都是细菌。祝你请病假好运。
item.description: The office is a mess of germs right now. Good luck taking a sick day. on.wsj.com/3HNNdMB on.wsj.com/3HNNdMB

item.title: 多年来，你和你的朋友拥有同样多的钱。现在，你们之间的差距太大了。这会对你们的友谊造成什么影响？
item.description: For years, you and your friend had about the same amount of money. Now, there’s a huge gap. What will it do to your friendship? on.wsj.com/3SzjZ8Y on.wsj.com/3SzjZ8Y

item.title: 猜猜谁有能力在工作日锻炼身体
item.description: Guess who has the clout to work out during the workday on.wsj.com/3UxalpW

item.title: 软银公布了一年多来的首次盈利报告，这主要得益于硅谷的复兴推动了其投资组合价值的增长。
item.description: SoftBank reported its first profit in more than a year, helped by a revival in Silicon Valley that drove up the value of its portfolio. on.wsj.com/3SRo48X on.wsj.com/3SRo48X

item.title: 你发誓要在新的一年里锻炼身体，但你做对了吗？以下是您可能破坏锻炼的 10 种方式
item.description: You vowed to exercise in the new year, but are you doing it right? Here are 10 ways you might be sabotaging your workouts on.wsj.com/3ODlH8m on.wsj.com/3ODlH8m

item.title: 对于伦敦市中心的黄金地段房地产来说，今年是艰难的一年，但也有一个亮点：租赁市场正在蓬勃发展。
item.description: It's been a tough year for prime central London real estate, but there's one bright spot: the rental market is thriving. on.wsj.com/42uylw4 on.wsj.com/42uylw4

item.title: 自 90 年代以来，越来越多的美国人在家中增设了小教堂，作为专用房间或独立建筑，其中一些小教堂的建造费用高达数十万美元。
item.description: Since the ’90s, more Americans have added chapels to their homes as dedicated rooms or separate buildings—some of which that cost hundreds of thousands to build on.wsj.com/3UxbmOM on.wsj.com/3UxbmOM

item.title: 中国的通货紧缩问题日益严重，这是经济萎靡日益加深的一个明显症状，给全球经济带来了麻烦
item.description: China’s deflation problem is getting worse, a stark symptom of a deepening economic malaise that spells trouble for the global economy on.wsj.com/42uGUHe on.wsj.com/42uGUHe

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登的国情咨文应该为美国的工薪阶层和中产阶级提供一条通往更美好未来的可靠道路，William Galston 写道。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Biden’s State of the Union address should offer working- and middle-class Americans a credible path to a better future, writes William Galston on.wsj.com/3HTvpQ9

item.title: 从黑帮聚会到摇摆派对，再到现代游客，底特律的施维茨浴场在过去的一个世纪里热情地接待了许多人。如果想一窥这座城市的过去，不妨来此一游。
item.description: From gangster gatherings to swinger parties to modern-day tourists, the Schvitz, a Detroit bathhouse, has provided a warm welcome to many over the last century. For a glimpse into the city’s past, plan a visit. on.wsj.com/3w5qIjn on.wsj.com/3w5qIjn

item.title: 如果你去了世界升级之都，并同意了所有的倒卖，会怎么样？当 @DawnGilbertson 带着对一切都说 "好 "的计划来到拉斯维加斯时，就会发生这样的事情。
item.description: What if you went to the world capital of upgrades and agreed to all the upsells? Here's what happened when @DawnGilbertson visited Las Vegas with a plan to say yes to everything. on.wsj.com/4brIcH3 on.wsj.com/4brIcH3

item.title: 查尔斯国王公开癌症诊断结果，打破了长期以来英国君主对自己的健康近乎完全谨慎的传统
item.description: King Charles opens up about cancer diagnosis, breaking long standing tradition of near total discretion about the British monarch’s health on.wsj.com/4bxMlJI on.wsj.com/4bxMlJI

item.title: 佛罗里达州一座拥有三栋房屋和一个私人游艇港湾的大院是美国最昂贵的挂牌房产，如果它的售价接近要价，将创下美国最昂贵的房屋销售记录。探索这座巨大的海滨庄园。
item.description: A Florida compound with three houses and a private yacht basin is the priciest listing in the U.S., and would set a record for the most expensive home sale in the country if it fetches close to its asking price. Explore the massive, waterfront estate. on.wsj.com/42thhqj

item.description: Tax question: A reader asks if he and his wife should hold off selling their home until one of them dies on.wsj.com/3OsqXvw on.wsj.com/3OsqXvw

item.title: 您认为需要专业人士来清洗您的高级珠宝吗？想多了。这里有一份在家专业清洁从钻石耳钉到结婚戒指的指南。
item.description: Think you need a pro to clean your fine jewelry? Think again. Here's a guide to expertly cleansing everything from diamond studs to wedding bands at home. on.wsj.com/42eHQiL on.wsj.com/42eHQiL

item.description: Alphabet, Amazon and UPS are among the companies that have announced job cuts in recent weeks. Here’s a look at others that have announced layoffs so far this year. on.wsj.com/3up05pi on.wsj.com/3up05pi

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：数百万美国人喜欢托比.凯斯的音乐和他的观点。他是一位不折不扣的爱国者，也是美国军队的朋友--2001 年 9 月 11 日恐怖袭击后，这位艺术家影响并捕捉到了美国人的情绪。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Millions of Americans loved Toby Keith’s music as well as his point of view. He was an unabashed patriot and a friend to U.S. troops—an artist who influenced and captured the American mood after the terrorist attacks on Sept. 11, 2001. on.wsj.com/49n3JPh

item.title: 快时尚公司Shein和TikTok的购物部门正在亚马逊的地盘上扩张，试图挖走亚马逊的员工，并在西雅图地区的同一栋办公楼里建造工作区。
item.description: Fast-fashion company Shein and TikTok’s shopping unit are expanding in Amazon's territory, seeking to poach Amazon’s employees and building out workspaces in the same Seattle-area office tower on.wsj.com/42AlyZ8 on.wsj.com/42AlyZ8
